title.v: Truy vấn nhu cầu công suất của nguồn lực

command.text:
declare @periodCode char(2), @periodName nvarchar(128), @d smalldatetime, @capacityRound varchar(32)
select @capacityRound = val from options where name = 'm_ip_cs' select @periodCode = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ky_hd_nd_crp' select @periodName = case when @@language = 'v' then ten_ky else ten_ky2 end from mdmky where ma_ky = @periodCode select @d = isnull(@d, getdate())
select 'this._capacityRound=''' + @capacityRound + ''';this._date=''' + convert(varchar(8), @d, 112) + ''';this._periodCode=''' + @periodCode + ''';this._periodName=''' + isnull(rtrim(replace(replace(@periodName, '\', '\\'), '''', '\''')), '') + '''; set$Form$DefaultValue(this);' as message return

action.text: if exists(select 1 from crdmnl where ma_nl = @ma_nl) begin select rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, b.ten_dvt%l from crdmnl a left join crdmdvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt where a.ma_nl = @ma_nl return end
